properties.areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 9 at 4:42AM AKST until January 10 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10
inches.

* WHERE...Portions of the eastern Gulf coast and the central
Panhandle including Wrangell, Port Alexander, Coffman Cove, and
Point Baker. For Sitka, only light snow to flurries is forecast.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 PM AKST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There will likely be a sharp northern edge
to the snowfall across this area with places to the north
receiving little to no snowfall.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM AKST FRIDAY
